channel.title: Compiling on linux
channel.description:
To compile on linux use thsi
[code]javac -cp 'src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar' 'src/net/cellkyborg/server/*.java src/net/cellkyborg/RSInstances/*.java'[/code]

item.title: Compiling on linux
item.dc:creator: @poo poo
item.description:
@poo wrote:

To compile on linux use thsi

javac -cp 'src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar' 'src/net/cellkyborg/server/*.java src/net/cellkyborg/RSInstances/*.java'
